content.description: Consider the processWords method. Assume that each of its two parameters is a String of length two or more.
content.question: public void processWords(String word1, String word2){String str1 = word1.substring(0, 2);String str2 = word2.substring(word2.length() - 1);String result = str2 + str1;System.out.println(result.indexOf(str2));}Which of the following best describes the value printed when processWords is called?

choices.label: A substring containing the last character of word2 is printed.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
